content: basic bucket hat pattern by c r ochet difficulty beginner basic bucket hat tools and materials abbreviations cotton yarn in your preferred magic_ring - magic_ring colour about 2-3 skeins - 50g each single_crochet - single_crochet 5 mm crochet hook increase - increase scissors slip_stitch - slip_stitch tapestry needle chain - chain stitch markers half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet flo - front loop only blo - back loop only finished measurements top = 14 cm crown height = 9-10 cm brim = 5-6 cm notes this pattern is written using american terminology and is worked in continuous rounds unless otherwise stated you can customize this pattern any way you like choose a different colour create stripes by changing colours every 3rd or 4th row add little decorations strawberries flowers etc i crochet this hat using double strands instead of one single strand of yarn i did this to make the hat sturdier you could also use a single strand but you might have to increase the number of row whenever you start a row start with chain 1 this does not count as a stitch whenever you end a row slip_stitch in the first stitch of the round this does not count as a stitch when increase is mentioned you should crochet 2 half_double_crochet in one stitch don t forget to put the hat on during crocheting to check the sizing and length of the hat and brim basic bucket hat -
